Body:
x, y = np.loadtxt('./peeemtee/tests/samples/charge_distribution.txt',
    unpack=True)
fitter = ChargeHistFitter()
fitter.pre_fit(x, y, print_level=0)
fitter.fit_pmt_resp_func(x, y, print_level=0, mod='uap')
assert np.sum((y - fitter.opt_prf_values) ** 2 / fitter.opt_prf_values
    ) / 195 < 2
